description: This file defines a React component named 'BarChart' that renders a horizontal bar chart with accessibility features. It supports input data as an object or array, sorts and limits the number of bars displayed, and includes screen reader support with a hidden table representation.

methods.name: BarChart
methods.description: A React component that renders a horizontal bar chart given data, with accessibility features and customizable formatting.

methods.name: formatNumber
methods.description: Formats a number according to locale with up to two decimal places.
